page.syntax: String as C = VARIABLES_ENUM(P variables[,C variable_enum_flags])

argument.name: variables
argument.description: A pointer to a variable frame.

page.discussion: VARIABLES_ENUM() returns a CR-LF delimited string of variable names in the variable frame referenced by Pointer.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following commands display a message box with all global variables.
section.example: 'get a pointer to the global variable frame g = global_variables() string = variables_enum(g) ui_msg_box("Global Variables", string)

section.description: The following commands list all of the local variables in a script.
section.example: v = local_variables() string = variables_enum(v) ui_msg_box("Local Variables", string)
